questions.question: The role of pass divider in a shell and tube heat exchanger is:

answers.a: To increase the velocity of the fluid
answers.b: To prevent leakage of tube side fluid with the shell side fluid
answers.d: To maintain the required baffle spacing

questions.question: Which of the following holds in the case of baffles in a shell and tube heat exchanger?

answers.b: Support the tubes and induce turbulence

questions.question: Which of the following is more appropriate with respect to the role of tube sheet inshell and tube heat exchanger?

answers.b: Prevents intermixing of tube and shell side fluids
answers.c: Increases the velocity of the fluid

questions.question: Which of the following terms holds true for turbulent flow?
The magnitude of heat transfer coefficient in turbulent flow is ___________ relative to laminar flow.
